tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE liability_insurance_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder VARCHAR(255),
    coverage_limits DECIMAL,
    terms_and_conditions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES insurance_policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE liability_insurance_policies (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name TEXT,
    coverage_limit DECIMAL,
    terms_and_conditions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_holders (
    holder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    holder_name TEXT,
    holder_email TEXT,
    holder_phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_companies (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    company_address TEXT,
    company_phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_holders (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_companies (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	hq_location VARCHAR(255),
	year_founded INT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_details (
	policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	coverage_limit DECIMAL,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE policy_conditions (
	policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	condition_description TEXT
)
